abbreviate-handshake.help: Enable/disable use of SSL abbreviated handshake.
abbreviate-handshake.name: abbreviate-handshake

options.help: Enable use of SSL abbreviated handshake.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable use of SSL abbreviated handshake.
options.name: disable

cert-cache-capacity.help: Maximum capacity of the host certificate cache (0 - 500, default = 200).
cert-cache-capacity.name: cert-cache-capacity

cert-cache-timeout.help: Time limit to keep certificate cache (1 - 120 min, default = 10).
cert-cache-timeout.name: cert-cache-timeout

kxp-queue-threshold.help: Maximum length of the CP KXP queue. When the queue becomes full, the proxy switches cipher functions to the main CPU (0 - 512, default = 16).
kxp-queue-threshold.name: kxp-queue-threshold

no-matching-cipher-action.help: Bypass or drop the connection when no matching cipher is found.
no-matching-cipher-action.name: no-matching-cipher-action

proxy-connect-timeout.help: Time limit to make an internal connection to the appropriate proxy process (1 - 60 sec, default = 30).
proxy-connect-timeout.name: proxy-connect-timeout

session-cache-capacity.help: Capacity of the SSL session cache (--Obsolete--) (1 - 1000, default = 500).
session-cache-capacity.name: session-cache-capacity

session-cache-timeout.help: Time limit to keep SSL session state (1 - 60 min, default = 20).
session-cache-timeout.name: session-cache-timeout

ssl-dh-bits.help: Bit-size of Diffie-Hellman (DH) prime used in DHE-RSA negotiation (default = 2048).
ssl-dh-bits.name: ssl-dh-bits

ssl-queue-threshold.help: Maximum length of the CP SSL queue. When the queue becomes full, the proxy switches cipher functions to the main CPU (0 - 512, default = 32).
ssl-queue-threshold.name: ssl-queue-threshold

ssl-send-empty-frags.help: Enable/disable sending empty fragments to avoid attack on CBC IV (for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0 only).
ssl-send-empty-frags.name: ssl-send-empty-frags
